settings.heading: General Policy Overview
settings.rich_text:
We understand that sometimes returns may be necessary. This Return Policy is designed to provide guidance on the process of returning trading cards purchased from The Rare Company. Please read the following terms carefully to ensure a smooth and efficient return process.

Note:
This Return Policy is subject to change without notice. Please check our website for the most up-to-date information.

settings.heading: Shipping Costs
settings.content: Customers are responsible for all shipping costs associated with the return, unless the return is due to an error on our part.

settings.heading: Eligibility for Returns
settings.content:
• Only unopened and undamaged trading card products are eligible for return.
  • Returns must be requested within ** days from the date of purchase.
  • Proof of purchase, such as a receipt or order confirmation, is required for all returns.

settings.heading: Refund Process
settings.content:
• Once the returned item is received and inspected, we will issue a refund to the original payment method.
  • Refunds will not include the original shipping costs.
  • Please allow ** business days for the refund to be processed.

settings.heading: Non-Returnable Items
settings.content:
• Opened or damaged trading card products.
  • Items not purchased from The Rare Company.
  • Items returned without proper authorization.

settings.heading: Packaging and Condition
settings.content:
• Trading cards must be returned in their original, unopened packaging.
  • The original packaging must be free from damage, stickers, or any other alterations.
  • Ensure that the product is securely packaged to prevent damage during transit.

settings.heading: Return Authorization
settings.content: To initiate a return, customers must contact our customer service department at [Customer Service Email/Phone Number] to obtain a Return Authorization (RA) number. This number must be clearly marked on the outside of the return package.

settings.heading: Exchange Option
settings.content: Exchanges are not provided for trading cards. Customers may return the item following the steps outlined in this policy and place a new order for the desired product.
